projects.title: Node.js CMS
body: Currently designing a modular Content Management System inspired by Wordpress's architecture.

projects.title: TimeUp
body: Developing a web application that helps track what movies you've watched using OmDb's Movie database.

projects.title: Troals
body: Every monday, a close friend and I review 3 goals that we have for our week. We determine wether we accomplished, completed or made some progress on the goal. We've been doing this for some time and now I am developing an application to maintain and augment this data. We have noticed trends in the challenges of goal completion, and one of the things we want to examine in this data is what affects our's and possibly other's abilities in completing goals.

projects.title: romolo.io
body: Developed this site as a blog and a hub for my information.
Developed REST API and admin panel that manages site data.
Plan to setup API's that pull data from online REST API's to track health and financial data.

projects.title: Trigonometry and Fractions Worksheet Generator
body: Developed two C++ programs programs that respectively generate a trig or fraction worksheet/quiz.
The programs generate Latex documents that can be converted to PDF.
